name: Uni Terminal
description: Uni Terminal is an innovative all-in-one trading terminal designed to streamline and enhance the trading experience for both crypto natives and beginners. Its primary purpose is to address the fragmented user experience in the crypto ecosystem by consolidating essential trading tools into a single, user-friendly interface. Functionally, Uni Terminal operates as a Chrome extension, mirroring the familiar ease-of-use found in standard browser wallet extensions. It integrates a multitude of trading tools, including trading, scanning, charting, and tracking functionalities, all accessible through a simple right-click action on any website. This feature allows users to quickly snipe, chart, or scan tokens, significantly reducing the need to juggle multiple tabs and applications. The utility of Uni Terminal extends to its customization capabilities. Users can tailor their experience by choosing from a variety of snipers like Maestro, UniBot, WagieBot, and Banana Gun, along with options to select preferred charting tools and display settings. Future enhancements promise further customization, including additional trading bots and various add-ons for call signals, volume tracking, and more.
